tool_description: Use this API to create virtual accounts, manage them, create financial transations, create transaction channels (payment provider).
name: Virtual Accounts API
title: Virtual Accounts API

api_list.name: GetTransactionsByAccount
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://virtual-accounts-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/accountsrvc/virtualaccounts/transactions/account/0dd3a3be-7783-4f87-b347-d9aed69a4334/all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "virtual-accounts-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://virtual-accounts-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/accountsrvc/virtualaccounts/transactions/account/{id}/all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "virtual-accounts-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: AddTransaction
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://virtual-accounts-api.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/accountsrvc/virtualaccounts/transactions/new"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "virtual-accounts-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
